title: Prized
description: The second title in Caragh O'Brien's dystopian trilogy, 'Prized' finds Gaia and her baby sister Maya trapped in the mysterious Sylum. Gaia is determined to uncover the secets of the village, at any cost. But when the decisions you make affect the lives of everyone around you, how can you be sure you're making the right choices?
author: Caragh M. O'Brien
